column1: Huilong (Chinese: 回隆; pinyin: Huílóng) is a town of Wei County of Handan City in extreme southern Hebei province
column3: bordering Henan to the south and situated 26 kilometres (16 mi) southwest of the county seat and 35 kilometres (22 mi) east of Anyang
column5: it has 29 villages under its administration.
